name: qomp (itch)
description:
qomp is a small game about freedom.
Includes a Steam Key.

  • 1 - 3 hours of gameplay
  • many mechanics
  • bossfights
  • not super hard
  • no secrets
  • beating the game unlocks challenges
  • beating the challenges unlocks nothing

  • invincibility
  • zoom-out
  • aim-assist
  • autofire

Made by Britt Brady, Clovelt, Stuffed Wombat & Miroko
